snippet: Sylvia Mathews Burwell, the nominee for secretary of health and human services, was called “a force for bringing people together” at her Senate confirmation hearing Wednesday.
abstract: Sylvia Mathews Burwell, Pres Obama's nominee for secretary of health and human services, appears to be on swift path to confirmation after she sails through another cordial Senate hearing without promising significant changes in federal health policy or regulations.
lead_paragraph: Sylvia Mathews Burwell, the nominee for secretary of health and human services, was called “a force for bringing people together” at her Senate confirmation hearing Wednesday.

headline.main: Another Breezy Hearing for Obama Health Pick
headline.print_headline: Another Breezy Hearing for Obama Health Pick
